uvi.description:
netfilter: conntrack: serialize hash resizes and cleanups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.71 by commit e2d192301a0df8160d1555b66ae8611e8050e424. For more details please see the references link.
